title: Vegan Mediterranean sandwich
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '12 pitted Kalamata olives, chopped', '1 red roasted pepper (from a jar), chopped', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 to 6 slices of your favourite bread', 'salad leaves']
